Text:
Thanks a lot dude!

I really appreciate for the post...

i just installed your 1.2 version for windows,do i need this version and if yes how do i update it?
if i download this version will it automatically update it for me or not?
thanks

aTV Flash doesn't update automatic but you needs to download and then run it.
If older version doesn't works or if you get oops! message then you need newer or most recent version of aTV Flash.
